title: League of Legends error forced a remake making me lose 21 LP!
body: I went into a ranked game and as soon as everyone had loaded in from the loading screen it said that I had a critical error and i needed to contact the developers. I find this ridiculous as I had no control over the remake as it wasn't from my end of the game. How is it fair that I get punished because theres a critical error/bug that hasn't occurred from my side. Literally just wasted time trying to get into a game to lose 21 LP because of Riots fault.

replies.body:
I understand that you're upset; however, there have to be measures in place in order to prevent abuse and to prevent players from leaving games without penalty.

No one wants to play a 4v5, and no one wants to go through a series of remakes- which is one of the reasons why a LP loss is a necessary measure. 

This is an opportunity to ensure that your client and computer are able to run the game. If your game crashes again, I would definitely recommend running through the [Bug Splat and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Support article.
